title: Jon Stewart uses an awkward montage to show how Trump is reusing old attacks
content: Jon Stewart has broken down how Trump is reusing old Biden attacks on Kamala Harris during his "Daily Show" monologue.

title: TikTok group chats are finally here
content: TikTok has added a group chat feature so you can send all those cucumber recipe videos to the group rather than just one person.
